reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 200/06: ZONING AREA - HALDIMAND COUNTY
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 200/06: ZONING AREA - HALDIMAND COUNTY
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. This Order applies to land in Haldimand County being part of Lot 17 Broken Front Concession on the Grand River designated as Part 1 on Reference Plan 18R-6249 and part of Lot 18 Broken Front Concession on the Grand River and parts of Lots B and C Range West of Plank Road (Geographic Township of Oneida) designated as parts 1, 2 and 3 on Reference Plan 18R-6217 deposited in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Haldimand (No. 18). O. Reg. 200/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. This Order applies to land in Haldimand County being part of Lot 17 Broken Front Concession on the Grand River designated as Part 1 on Reference Plan 18R-6249 and part of Lot 18 Broken Front Concession on the Grand River and parts of Lots B and C Range West of Plank Road (Geographic Township of Oneida) designated as parts 1, 2 and 3 on Reference Plan 18R-6217 deposited in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Haldimand (No. 18). O. Reg. 200/06, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) Every use of land and the erection, location and use of any building or structure is prohibited on land described in section 1. O. Reg. 200/06, s. 2 (1). (2) Additions to any building or structure or the extension or enlargement of any building or structure is prohibited. O. Reg. 200/06, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) Every use of land and the erection, location and use of any building or structure is prohibited on land described in section 1. O. Reg. 200/06, s. 2 (1).

(2) Additions to any building or structure or the extension or enlargement of any building or structure is prohibited. O. Reg. 200/06, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location and use of buildings or structures shall be in accordance with this Order. O. Reg. 200/06, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location and use of buildings or structures shall be in accordance with this Order. O. Reg. 200/06, s. 3.
